project: Mobile Browser Optimization for Ferris Wiggum Web App
description: The Ferris Wiggum web application is currently designed for desktop viewports. Users accessing the app on mobile browsers (minimum 390px width) encounter layout issues including: - Sidebar-based file picker layout doesn't fit narrow screens - Two-column dashboard layouts break on mobile - Form inputs and buttons are too small for touch interaction - The PRD editor resembles a code editor rather than a form with text areas - Body padding consumes too much horizontal space on narrow screens

stories.title: Reduce Body Padding on Mobile
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** reduced body padding on narrow screens So that** content has more horizontal space
acceptance_criteria: Body padding reduces from 24px to 12px at viewport width ≤ 480px

stories.title: Make Navbar Mobile-Friendly
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the navbar to wrap gracefully on narrow screens So that** I can access all navigation links without overflow
acceptance_criteria: Navigation links remain accessible at 390px width

stories.title: Stack File Picker Layout on Mobile
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the file picker sidebar and main area to stack vertically So that** I can browse directories without horizontal scrolling
acceptance_criteria: File picker changes from horizontal to vertical layout at ≤ 480px
Quick Access shortcuts section appears above the file browser
Sidebar width becomes 100% instead of fixed 200px
Select button is easily tappable (44px minimum height)

stories.title: Stack Session Dashboard Layout on Mobile
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the dashboard main content and sidebar to stack vertically So that** I can view all session information without horizontal scrolling
acceptance_criteria: `.ralph-main` grid changes to single column at ≤ 768px (already exists)
Sidebar panels stack below main content
All panels remain readable at 390px width

stories.title: Mobile-Optimize Session Header
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the session header controls and stats to wrap on narrow screens So that** I can interact with all controls without overflow
acceptance_criteria: Session header changes to column layout on mobile
Session controls wrap and remain touch-friendly (44px minimum)
Session stats wrap into multiple rows
Project path truncates with ellipsis if too long

stories.title: Convert PRD Editor to Form-Based UI
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the PRD editor to look like a form with labeled text areas So that** editing feels natural on mobile rather than like using a code editor
acceptance_criteria: PRD markdown textarea has a visible label above it
Textarea uses standard form styling (not monospace code editor appearance)
Editor tabs remain accessible and wrap if needed
Preview mode story cards display properly at 390px

stories.title: Mobile-Optimize PRD Conversation Chat UI
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the chat interface to work well on narrow screens So that** I can have PRD conversations comfortably on mobile
acceptance_criteria: Message bubbles respect container width with proper padding
Input area stacks send button below textarea on mobile

stories.title: Mobile-Optimize Token Meter
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the token meter breakdown to display properly on narrow screens So that** I can read token usage statistics
acceptance_criteria: Meter breakdown grid changes to single column at ≤ 480px
All labels and values remain readable

stories.title: Mobile-Optimize Activity Log
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the activity log to be readable on narrow screens So that** I can monitor session activity on mobile
acceptance_criteria: Activity rows wrap content instead of overflowing
Monospace text uses smaller font size on mobile

stories.title: Ensure All Buttons Meet Touch Target Size
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** all buttons to be easily tappable So that** I don't accidentally tap the wrong control
acceptance_criteria: All `.btn` elements have minimum 44px height on mobile
Icon buttons (`.btn-icon`) have minimum 44x44px touch area
Tab buttons have adequate touch targets

stories.title: Mobile-Optimize Story Progress Cards
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** story cards to display properly on narrow screens So that** I can track story progress on mobile
acceptance_criteria: Story header wraps gracefully (ID, title, priority)
Acceptance criteria list has appropriate padding
Cards have adequate spacing on mobile

stories.title: Mobile-Optimize Session List (Dashboard)
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the session list cards to display properly on narrow screens So that** I can browse and select sessions on mobile
acceptance_criteria: Session info wraps instead of overflowing

stories.title: Mobile-Optimize Guardrails Panel
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** guardrail alerts to display properly on narrow screens So that** I can review warnings on mobile
acceptance_criteria: Guardrail cards fit within container at 390px

stories.title: Mobile-Optimize Git Panel
stories.description: As a** mobile user I want** the git panel to display properly on narrow screens So that** I can view git status on mobile
acceptance_criteria: Git panel content fits within container at 390px
Branch names truncate with ellipsis if too long
